Posts.Content: WorriedDaughter25 wrote: 182.119.1 So imagine this, Moms Tumor Markers in December 65, Jan 235, and now Feb 1000!!!! WOW, Im just so frustrated with everything right now, and not understanding any of it. Have to remeber that radiation consult is on Wednesday, Last I posted she was having lots of pain, well the Thoracic Spine is full of cancer specially at T11, this is very frustrating and scary for Mom and myself. Thanks all for just letting me Rant!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: tumor markers grr WorriedDaughter25 mkkjd60

Posts.Content: WorriedDaughter25 wrote: Here I am at work, have to go with Mom in the middle of not only doing Radiation to her spine but today she has to get IV Calcium due to low Calcium. Yesterday she was also started on 75mcq of Fentanyl pain patch. So many thoughts cross my mind at this point- yet I have to stay strong. You get to that point when you wonder just how strong you can continue to be. Eager to see what the Tumor Markers were from Yesterday considering we doubled up on the Xeloda, going from 7 days on 7 off to Continous without a break. Hope all is well!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Low Calcium WorriedDaughter25 KittyKitty

Posts.Content: WorriedDaughter25 wrote: JUST REVIEVED MOMS PHONE CALL. PET SCAN SHOWS THAT BREAST TUMOR HAS NOT GROWN, BUT THE LESIONS ARE BACK ON HER LIVER X2 AND WORSE ON SPINE. RADIATION ONC MEETING TODAY TO DUE RAD TO SPINE. STOPPED FEMARA AND ZOLADEX BEGAN FASLODEX INJECTIONS. MY WHOLE BODY IS JUST SO WEAK- HOW CAN THIS KEEP HAPPENING. I DONT WANT MY MOM TO HURT!!
